title: "You're just the dumbest criminal": Woman hunts down dude who stole her car, drags him by his dreadlocks
description:
Every time you commit a crime you are taking a risk. If you're lucky, you find yourself in possession of something you didn't have to pay for yourself. If not, you may find yourself being embarrassed in front of your boys while the woman you stole from drags you out of the barbershop by your dreadlocks. Some dude in Detroit (go figure) picked the wrong Mercedes Benz to steal.

Bianca Chambers. A true American hero lmaoooooo pic.twitter.com/k2E2H8dNLq
— 𝔼𝕓. (@EbtheCeleb) July 16, 2021
You're just the dumbest criminal, that's all. You're joyriding in my car like nobody was going to see you.

This is the most embarrassing apprehension of a car thief since that dude got taken down by Santa Claus. Embarrassing for the thief. Hysterical for everyone watching.

The story goes like this. Bianca Chambers is a boutique owner with a Mercedes-Benz. Dummy McDumberson stole that Mercedes-Benz. McDumberson then drives the stolen Benz around the same neighborhood Chambers owns a boutique in. This allowed Chambers to track the stolen vehicle via tips on social media. Three times she found her car, but by the time police came Dummy drove off.

The fourth time, Chambers took matters into her own hands. She took out her own tires so McDumberson couldn't escape. She then goes into the barbershop to confront McDumberson and drags him by his dreadlocks. The other people in the shop helped make a citizen's arrest until police showed up. Chambers got her Benz back. Her nice and cleans Benz. McDumberson took the car to get detailed.

The look on McDumberson's face as he's being dragged makes the video. Rarely do you catch the exact moment someone finds themselves questioning all their poor life choices all at once. McDumberson will now have plenty of time to think about where it all went wrong.

Chambers, if the boutique doesn't work out, should consider a career as a private investigator and/or a bounty hunter. She does great work.

>

<

Brodigan is Grand Poobah of this here website and when he isn't writing words about things enjoys day drinking, pro-wrestling, and country music. You can find him on the Twitter too.

title: "Get her!": Woman brings traffic to a halt starting a fight, then tries running away before eating pavement
description:
As someone who works from home, I miss out on the morning commute. The most excitement from my commute to my office is a hungry cat screaming at me while I try to make coffee and prepare for another day of Facebook-throttling content. So, I miss out on things like this: freeway traffic being brought to a standstill over two women getting into fisticuffs.

And that's before the footrace starts.

Nice little morning commute! pic.twitter.com/SmqB1zSNA1
— Old Row (@OldRowViral) August 9, 2022

You know the deal. It's a viral video, allow for missing context and whatnot. The context I'm most curious about is how this fight started. Because it takes place in the middle of a freeway, and shawty with the shorty-shorts doesn't look like someone who was driving. Unless her man was driving, only he's beta and, after cutting someone off, sat in the car while his girlfriend did all the work.

Either that, or the one in white is the "other woman" and picked an awkward time to confront her boyfriend's wife. And how did she know they would be driving down the freeway at that moment and manage to run into the middle of traffic? These are the questions we need answered.

I feel bad for the one in white because we've all been there. You pick a fight with someone more significant than you, and then the moment of clarity smacks you upside the head that... I just picked a fight with someone bigger than me. Fight or flight. She chose flight. Until she found herself eating pavement. Hey, it happens.

>

<

Brodigan is Grand Poobah of this here website and when he isn't writing words about things enjoys day drinking, pro-wrestling, and country music. You can find him on the Twitter too.

title: Watch: How a race hoax from the BLM riots ruined a white girl's life
description:
You’re about to hear a story that is part of a larger problem. The agreed-upon lie. This is the story of a BLM activist ruining the life of an innocent girl for the sake of activism. The baseless accounts made by this activist had no substantiation.

In July of 2020, a white UVA student, Morgan Bettinger, was falsely accused by a UVA student activist, and the accusations ruined her life.

During the George Floyd “protests” 19-year-old Zyahna Bryant accused Bettigner of threatening to run over protestors. Bryant went on a crusade trying to get Bettinger suspended. Bettinger was shunned at school and even stalked in her hometown.

It was all a lie.

An investigation by UVA’s Office for Equal Opportunity and Civil Rights, “Not only [found] that Bettinger didn't legally harass Bryant, but it painted a picture of just how shaky Bryant's allegations were.” FOUR of FIVE allegations by Bryant against Bettinger were deemed to be false.

Crowder and the gang go into further detail on this and how it's part of a bigger social justice HOAX culture on today's show.

title: WATCH TODAY'S SHOW: BLM RACE HOAX RUINS WHITE GIRL'S LIFE!
description:
Black Lives Matter activists ruined a University of Virginia student’s reputation, accusing her of referring to George Floyd protesters as “speed bumps.” We provide examples of all racial hoax's with proof. Also, Biden says some really dumb things. During the Mug Club portion we'll be playing Met Gala or not. Tune in!

RACE HOAX RUINS VIRGINIA STUDENT’S LIFE

  • Celebrated BLM activist ruthlessly destroyed white student's life by accusing her of saying racial justice protesters would 'make good speed bumps' - only to later admit she may have MISHEARD





  • How an Ill-Informed Internet Mob Ruined a UVA Student's Life
  • UVA Student Threatens BLM Protesters
  • A reflection on Charlottesville - five years after the Unite the Right Rally
  • Student who led 2016 petition to remove Lee statue in Charlottesville thanks ancestors, activists
  • The girl who brought down a statue
  • Brothers in Jussie Smollett hoax break silence, say actor wanted to be 'poster child for activism'

  • BYU apologizes to a banned fan, saying it found no proof they yelled racial slurs
  • It’s High Time Columbia’s Mattress Girl Was Discredited
  • Rolling Stone to Pay $1.65 Million to Fraternity Over Discredited Rape Story

title: Ron DeSantis: We're executing convicted pedos in Florida now
description:
Ron DeSantis is signing conservative reform after conservative reform to end the Florida legislative session. And possibly segue into a presidential run?

Today, I signed legislation that will:
- Makes child rapists eligible for the death penalty with the minimum sentence of life in prison without parole
- Impose additional penalties on fentanyl and drug-related crimes targeted at children
- Protect Floridians from disastrous… pic.twitter.com/sO1mkcfm0a
— Ron DeSantis (@GovRonDeSantis) May 1, 2023

His most recent batch involves criminal justice reform. Though, unlike other criminal justice reforms, DeSantis looks to make things more difficult for criminals and less difficult for law-abiding citizens. HB 1627 bans a lot of the woke "bail reform" policies that have caused a rise in crime in progressive areas they've been enacted. HB 1359 targets the trafficking of fentanyl. And HB 1297 will impose the death penalty for pedophiles who commit sexual battery against children under the age of 12.

On behalf of mamas, thank you @GovRonDeSantis.

Serial rapists molesting little children deserve the ultimate punishment, full stop.

Today’s legislation rightfully challenges U.S. Supreme Court precedent and puts our nation on a path to hold the worst of the worst accountable. pic.twitter.com/tiPJI97GFp
— Casey DeSantis (@CaseyDeSantis) May 1, 2023

The governor said in a statement about this specific common-sense reform, he is prepared to go "all the way to the U.S. Supreme Court to overrule judicial precedents which have unjustly shielded child rapists from the death penalty and denied victims and their loved ones the opportunity to pursue ultimate justice against these most heinous criminals."

It is WIDELY expected DeSantis will announce his run for president after the legislative session. That day is expected to come in the next week or so. Most polls have him in second place even though he hasn't announced yet.

>

<

title: Chelsea Clinton expresses support for allowing pornography in schools, according to fact-checkers
description:
Chelsea Clinton has signaled her virtue over allowing pornography in schools. She claims she opposes "banning" books in schools, but an independent fact-checker says otherwise.

Chelsea tweets "over 50% of the attempted book bans" involve LGBTQ+ characters. Which, again, the books aren't banned. Chelsea can still go to any bookstore and order pornography for her kids. She has the parental choice to do so. But in states like Florida, laws have been passed to also allow parents the choice to say certain pornographic materials don't belong in schools.

Like with "Gender Queer," the book featured in the article Chelsea shared. According to the independent fact-checkers at Community Notes, the book features sexually explicit material including visual depictions of oral sex, masturbation and adult sexual contact with a minor.

Over 50% of the attempted book bans last year involved books with LGBTQ+ characters & themes. Books are a vital way that children, adolescents and adults learn about themselves and our world. Bans such as these are nothing but harmful: https://t.co/eblRSU7tZk
— Chelsea Clinton (@ChelseaClinton) April 27, 2023

It's weird how so many books schools put in libraries to promote "inclusion" and "tolerance" include graphic sex, tasting your vagina slime, the proper techniques of giving a "handy," and a graphic play-by-play of two dudes f*cking. Those same topics written verbatim by an incel are a Penthouse forum letter. If it's written by anyone who identifies an L,G, B, especially T, Q, A, I, other I, P, or whatever the +'s are, they win awards and have their books placed on public high school reading lists.

Gender Queer is pornagraphy. Stop pushing this weird smut on children and acting like decent, normal people are Nazi's because they don't want this degenerate stuff in elementary schools. pic.twitter.com/FXLryO08NK
— Dataracer (@Dataracer117) May 2, 2023

It's also weird how so many public school advocates have gone all in on making sure your kids have access to this pornography.

“The vast majority of parents want their kids’ schools to be open and welcoming settings for education, not battlefields in culture wars designed primarily to goose conservative turnout at election time.” Exactly.https://t.co/BowIfFpNcU
— Randi Weingarten 🇺🇦🇺🇸💪🏿👩🎓 (@rweingarten) December 20, 2022

Thank God (or Elon) we have the independent fact-checkers at Community Notes. Otherwise, Chelsea Clinton would have been allowed to spread this dangerous disinformation that books are being "banned" and people on Twitter may have believed her.

>

<

title: Bud Light effect? Coca-Cola gets the message, votes AGAINST woke proposal to target pro-life states
description:
Coca-Cola has been there before. And after seeing what happened to Bud Light is saying, "Oh no. Not this time. Not again." Shareholders have voted AGAINST a proposal that would target "pro-life states" where abortion restrictions have been passed. It sounds like any state where abortion is restricted prior to just before the baby pops out.

The proposal was introduced by As You Saw, a non-profit that gets off on forcing ESG policies in corporations. And I quote:

"In its discretion, the board's analysis may include effects on employee hiring, retention, and productivity, and decisions regarding closure or expansion of operations in states proposing or enacting restrictive laws and strategies, such as public policy advocacy by the company, related political contribution policies, and human resources or educational strategies."

They wanted Coke to cease operation in states that introduced abortion restrictions. Again, it is assumed restricting abortion at any point before the baby pops out.

Coca-Cola shareholders voted, "Nah, we good."

Besides the real-time warning signs of the Bud Light fiasco (TikTok ingénue Dylan Mulvaney, Woke VP of Marketing Melissa Weinerchild, the dumbest brand decision EVAH, etc.) and seeing what it did to business there, Coke has already run into woke trouble.

In 2021, a whistleblower leaked about a survey Coke was making employees take that would encourage them to "be less white." And I know what you're thinking. "Brodigan, that's not woke. That's RACIST!"

You would think so, huh? Turns out it's not racist, it's "ANTI-"racist, which makes it woke and equity. See how that works?

Could it be a Bud Light effect? We'll see. I can't imagine it's a coincidence that shareholders voted against this after seeing what happened to billions and billions of now former Anhauser-Busch dollars.

>

<
